desc: G'WAAN Lifestyle Company was created to cater to the Modern man with an Afro & Caribbean heritage. Afro & Caribbean men have a unique style all of their own and G'WAAN was developed to celebrate it. G`WAAN Beard Oil uses 100% natural Caribbean nourishing oils to provide beard softening and growth properties.

layout.text: A Lifestyle Brand For The Modern Afro & Caribbean Man
